title: 9 years since the release and we still dont get our lp back if someone leaves mid ranked game
body:
9 YEARS, 9 years, we still dont get out LP back if someone leaves midgame, after the remake window. Let me elaborate. 

Last game i had a singed who traded 1v1 with Irelia first kills, then she killed him again, and he went afk for the next 15 minutes, now i was playing kassadin surviving in lane with swain farming where i could, botlane going even and so on. But since this guy left we lost the game immediately and we tried to hold on but it was futile. So when will we actually start getting our LP back Riot?

replies.body: It could potentially be abused.

>
> It could potentially be abused.

It will get abused.
And Riot said that multiple times, idk why people act like Riot didn't address this specific ranked mechanics at least once.

How? You would still be at the same amount of LP with which you started the game.

Because if a team is losing horribly, someone on the team can intentionally leave the game on purpose in order to "take the loss" for everyone else, and the rest get to keep their LP.

It would happen rarily because everyone values their lp
Itll be like win trading. But for every elo. Itll be abused for sure.

Isn't it obvious on why it's not going to be added?

Here's the obvious answer:
It will be abused to oblivion.
At this point nobody will lose LP and for all we know, a way will be found to become Diamond+ or so.

Thats the go to answer for everyone that knocks it, but its not something that should be implemented for the players that don't need it, in plat+ its pretty uncommon that someone willingly leaves a game to force a loss, but in gold and lower it's extremely common. A system like this would never be implemented in higher elo, which higher elo players are the ones that would be abusing it, nobody is abusing an lp loss forgiveness system in silver... and even if they did it would be pointless to care because its silver and they gain nothing out of doing it but getting from silver to gold which is basically still silver. 

It's also extremely obvious for riot to recognize if someone was abusing the system as well because they can tell when an account has left 10 games at 15 minutes and would then obviously punish the account with a restriction?

> It's also extremely obvious for riot to recognize if someone was abusing the system as well because they can tell when an account has left 10 games at 15 minutes and would then obviously punish the account with a restriction?

In obvious cases like that, yeah. But that isn't what is gonna happen, people are just gonna flame and bully and demand the person doing the worst to leave so they don't get punished. So unless that person in particular continues to do poorly game after game, which is unlikely, they won't be caught.
Yeah sure reward players for flaming/trolling/abusing their teammates into leaving the game, great idea.

If someone leaves in the first min of the game, the game will auto remake. After that, if someone leaves, you have to wait 2 mins to avoid penalty but you still lose MMR.
